mapper.select: SELECT i.StoreID as StoreID, i.ReceiptID as ReceiptID, i.GoodsID as GoodsID, SUM (i.RecQty) AS qty FROM Items i right JOIN ( SELECT StoreID, ReceiptID FROM Manifest WHERE OrdDate >= #{items.OrdDate} GROUP BY StoreID, ReceiptID ) b ON b.StoreID = i.StoreID AND b.ReceiptID = i.ReceiptID where i.StoreID !='' GROUP BY i.StoreID, i.ReceiptID, i.GoodsID ORDER BY qty desc
